backend/main.mo: Defines a Motoko actor for storing and retrieving blog posts with create, fetch, list, filter, and count operations.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata mapping features to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for various frontend source files used across the app.
frontend/index.css: Defines global CSS and Tailwind variables for theming, colors, and layout in light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for home, posts list, and post detail pages using SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Renders a blog post preview card showing categories, title, excerpt, author, and formatted date.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Displays site footer with branding, links, social icons, and Caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements the responsive site header with logo, navigation links, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Wraps pages with a header, main content area, and footer layout structure.
frontend/src/content/samplePosts.ts: Exports sample blog post data used as fallback content for the site.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor using React Query, updating it when the user's identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePosts.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch posts, single posts, posts by category, and post counts with fallbacks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark mode variables and base typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero content, featured posts, lifestyle CTA, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Displays full post details by slug with loading, error handling, metadata, and formatted content.
frontend/src/pages/PostsListPage.tsx: Shows a searchable, filterable list of posts with category selection and loading states.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, goals, features, and design requirements for building the Zeekly tech‑focused blog platform.
